name: cordova-plugin-custom-url-handler
description: A Cordova plugin to register a custom URL scheme and override WebView behavior to launch specific URLs in the native mobile browser.
author: Mohamed Saeed

variables.name: URL_SCHEME
variables.description: The custom scheme used to launch the app (e.g., 'myapp').

variables.name: IOS_BUNDLE_ID
variables.description: The reverse domain bundle ID for iOS (e.g., 'com.mycompany.appname'). Used for CFBundleURLName.
